dmca.title: Google DMCA - Indo Vacations
dmca.body:
Google, Inc.

Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints

1000 Amphitheatre Parkway

Mountain View, CA 94043

USA

(650) 963-3255

Attn: Legal, DMCA complaints

Reference: infringement notification

Dear Sir / Madam

We have discovered very recently that a considerable part of our website has been copied and used illegally without permission from us. We have prepared appropriate information and mentioning this below. We request to you to please remove the below mentioned contents from your search results and take the appropriate action against this practice of the company whose information is as followed:

Mr. Rajesh Kotecha
Chakrapani Ayurveda Clinic & Research Center, A - 33, Prabhu Marg Tilak Nagar, Jaipur-302004, India.
Fax : +91-141-2624003	Phone: +91-141-2820746
E-mail: info@chakrapaniayurveda.com
Website: http://www.chakrapaniayurveda.com/

The prepared information has infringing pages and copyrighted work.

Infringing pages are where our copyrighted information is being published illegally on http://www.chakrapaniayurveda.com/

* Copyrighted work is mentioned where the original contents are on our website: http://www.indovacations.net (If needed further information can be provided)

1. Infringing Web Page: http://www.chakrapaniayurveda.com/panchakarma.html Copyrightedwork: http://www.indovacations.net/english/Ayurveda.htm

2. Infringing Web Page: http://www.chakrapaniayurveda.com/shirodhara.html
Copyrightedwork: http://www.indovacations.net/english/Shirodhara.htm

3. Infringing Web Page: http://chakrapaniayurveda.com/massage.html
Copyrightedwork: http://www.indovacations.net/english/Abhyanga.htm

4.Infringing Web Page: http://chakrapaniayurveda.com/nasya.html
Copyrightedwork: http://www.indovacations.net/english/Nasyam.htm

5. Infringing Web Page: http://chakrapaniayurveda.com/Pizhichil.html
Copyrightedwork: http://www.indovacations.net/english/Pizhichil.htm

6. Infringing Web Page: http://chakrapaniayurveda.com/shirobasti.html
Copyrightedwork: http://www.indovacations.net/english/Shirovasthi.htm

7. Infringing Web Page: http://chakrapaniayurveda.com/tarpan.html
Copyrightedwork: ht1p://www.indovacations.net/english/Netratarpana.htm

8.Infringing Web Page: http://chakrapaniayurveda.com/khizi.html
Copyrightedwork: http://www.indovacations.net/english/Kizhi.htm

9.Infringing Web Page: http://chakrapaniayurveda.com/pinda.html
Copyrightedwork: http://www.indovacations.net/english/PindaSveda.htm

10.Infringing Web Page: http:!/chakrapaniayurveda.com/udvartanam.html
Copyrightedwork: http://www.indovacations.net/english/Udvarthanam.htm

11. Infringing Web Page: http://chakrapaniayurveda.com/basti.html
Copyrightedwork: http://www.indovacations.net/english/Basti.htm

12. Infringing Web Page: http://chakrapaniayurveda.com/urobasti.html
Copyrightedwork: http://www.indovacations.net/english/Urovasthi.htm

13.Infringing Web Page: http://chakrapaniayurveda.com/steam.html
Copyrightedwork: http://www.indovacations.net/english/VASHPASWEDANAM.htm

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Looking forward for an urgent and appropriate action in the above matter.

Sanjeev Minglani

Proprietor
(Proprietor, Indo Vacations, 312/06, Pushpawali, Valmiki Marg, Raja Park, Jaipur 302004, INDIA)
